about.storyIntro: üåø‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® Saathiiiüåø was founded to bridge the technology gap in agriculture by providing farmers with modern, data-driven tools. Our journey began with a simple idea: empower every farmer with the right information at the right time.
about.storyPoint1: We started by developing a platform that integrates hyper-local weather data to assist with planting and harvesting decisions.
about.storyPoint2: Our mission expanded to include providing real-time market prices, connecting farmers directly with buyers to ensure fair compensation.
about.storyPoint3: Today, we are committed to building a digital ecosystem that promotes sustainable farming practices and empowers the agricultural community.
about.value1Text: We provide tools and knowledge to help farmers make informed decisions and take control of their livelihoods.
about.value2Text: We promote eco-friendly practices that benefit both the land and the farmer, ensuring a healthier future.
about.value3Text: We believe in a strong, connected network where farmers can share knowledge and grow together.
